name: Thai Sweet Potato Soup
author: Nan
summary: Great vegetarian option. Top this Thai sweet potato soup with lime wedges, chopped cilantro, and unsweetened shredded coconut.
ingredients: 4 cups peeled and diced sweet potatoes
kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium-high heat
Add onion and saute until soft and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes
Add curry paste, Sriracha sauce, ginger, and garlic; saute until fragrant, 3 to 4 minutes
Stir in sweet potatoes and carrots; season with kosher salt and pepper
Add vegetable broth and bring to a boil
Reduce the heat to low and simmer until vegetables are fork tender, 20 to 25 minutes
Turn off the heat and puree with an immersion blender until soup is smooth
Stir in coconut milk and adjust seasoning, if necessary
